net.adamcin.oakpal.core.jcrfacade.security

Class AccessControlManagerFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.adamcin.oakpal.core.jcrfacade.security.AccessControlManagerFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.jcr.security.AccessControlManager, org.apache.jackrabbit.api.security.JackrabbitAccessControlManager

    public class AccessControlManagerFacade
extends Object
implements org.apache.jackrabbit.api.security.JackrabbitAccessControlManager
    Wraps JackrabbitAccessControlManager to prevent writes by handlers.
